north_star: Ensure the security and integrity of all systems and data across the organization, mitigating risks and protecting the business from potential threats.
mission: To provide expert security guidance, perform thorough risk assessments, and implement best practices to safeguard the company's assets and data.
vision: To create a secure and resilient organization where security is integrated into every aspect of operations, ensuring business continuity and stakeholder trust.
values_principals: Proactive Security: Anticipate and mitigate risks before they become threats.
Integrity: Ensure the integrity and confidentiality of data.
Collaboration: Work closely with all teams to integrate security best practices.
Continuous Improvement: Regularly update and improve security measures.
Transparency: Maintain clear and open communication regarding security policies and practices.

team_structure.title: Team Lead
team_structure.responsibilities: Oversee team operations, prioritize tasks, and ensure alignment with broader security goals.

team_structure.title: Security Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Perform security assessments, develop security measures, and provide guidance on best practices.

team_structure.title: Risk Analyst
team_structure.responsibilities: Identify and assess potential risks, and develop strategies to mitigate them.

team_structure.title: Penetration Tester
team_structure.responsibilities: Conduct manual penetration testing upon request to identify vulnerabilities.

team_structure.title: Security Consultant
team_structure.responsibilities: Provide consulting services to application owners and platform teams on security best practices.

priorities: Perform manual penetration testing upon request.
Provide consulting on security best practices.
Develop and maintain security policies and procedures.
Conduct regular risk assessments and mitigation strategies.
Collaborate with all teams to ensure security is integrated into all operations.

meeting_cadence.purpose: Quick updates on progress, blockers, and plans for the day.
Review security incidents, assessments, and ongoing projects.
Conduct risk assessments and update mitigation strategies.
meeting_cadence.attendees: Team Lead, Security Engineers, Risk Analysts

meeting_cadence.purpose: Discuss consulting activities and feedback from application and platform teams.
meeting_cadence.attendees: Security Consultants, Application Owners, Platform Team Representatives

performance_metrics.justification: Identifying vulnerabilities helps to proactively address potential security issues.
performance_metrics.measurement: Count of vulnerabilities identified during penetration testing.

performance_metrics.justification: Quick resolution of security issues minimizes potential damage.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time taken to resolve identified security issues.

performance_metrics.justification: Ensuring adherence to security policies is crucial for maintaining a secure environment.
performance_metrics.measurement: Percentage of teams compliant with security policies.

performance_metrics.justification: Regular risk assessments help in identifying and mitigating new risks.

service_level_agreements.SLA: Conduct manual penetration testing within 10 business days of request.
Initial response within 1 hour, 90% of issues resolved within 2 business days.
Provide consulting feedback within 3 business days of request.
